channel.title: ::roll command problem

item.title: ::roll command problem
item.dc:creator: @deadrose91 deadrose91
item.description:
@deadrose91 wrote:

k moparscape im using mithscape 508 source and heres my problem, i made a ::roll command, for a gambel option of whatever, so heres my code at the moment

else if (cmd[0].equals(“roll”)) {
int message = Misc.random(1);//Made by Aaron (co-owner of Dynasty PKz)
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “<img=1>”+Misc.optimizeText(p.username)+" has rolled a 1");
}

so when i hit the command ::roll i want it to shoutout whoever did the commands number he or she rolled and what its doing is just showing it in the text bar im wanting it to either shout out or yell like the ::yell command.

if u have any idea what the problem is please tell me ill even rep ya lol

Read full topic
